abstract: Global stocks steady as United States markets advance; progress is tied to strong company reports from major companies like UPS and Ford.
lead_paragraph: As global stocks steadied, American markets rose on strong results from Ford, UPS and other big companies.

headline.main: U.S. Markets Advance After a Five-Day Decline
headline.print_headline: U.S. Markets Advance After a Five-Day Decline

snippet: As global stocks steadied, American markets rose on strong results from Ford, UPS and other big companies.
